name: Date Filter
author: Biprojit Dey

sections.description:
Filter posts by date range, filter products by date range in your website.

  1. Are you the Admin of your blog website? Do you want your readers to have facility of searching posts of a particular date range? Or
  2. Are you the Admin of your e-commerce website? Do you want your buyers to have facility of searching products of a particular date range? For example, they want to see products which are added in last 7 days. Then Hey Admin, your want is very smartly served by this widget plugin. Just activate and place this widget in your desired area of website and let the website viewers search by entering date range from and to. Here you go… Happy Filtering ðŸ™‚

Demo Video URL :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zyjx-aeFSL4
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the ‘Widgets’ screen to add the ‘Date Filter’ widget to your desired area.
sections.faq:
Who are the users of this plugin?

Well, any website user can use this plugin. But this plugin will be main purposeful for a Website Owner or a Admin or a User with administrative rights who wants his/her website users to have extensive facility of searching through date range.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the ‘Widgets’ screen to add the ‘Date Filter’ widget to your desired area.

  • Updated on 2017-12-19
  • Backward Compatibility with WordPress Version 4.0
  • Minor Bug Fixes

1.0

  • Updated on 2017-11-19
  • Launched the plugin for the first time
